extendedInfo.description: Sort It! is a NEW highly addictive quiz and puzzle game. Sort It! is based on the principle of image distribution in the right logical order. Each game level consists of 5+1 pics. You should analyze those pics and find out one common theme which unites them. No words, just one hint â the 6th additional large picture showing a common feature joining other 5 pics. Think and guess how to connect the pics and place 5 pictures into logic order.  Test your brain and demonstrate your logic abilities. Sort It! game â Fun way to train your analytical thinking!
